items.name: Galvanic Arc
items.target: One creature or object per minion

effects.tier2: 5 lightning damage; the lightning spreads 1 square
effects.tier3: 7 lightning damage; the lightning spreads 2 squares

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The lightning's spread is the distance it arcs from a target to nearby enemies. Each enemy within that distance takes 2 lightning damage.
When the sparkslinger is reduced to 0 Stamina, their loyalty collar explodes, dealing 1d6 damage to each adjacent enemy and object.
